Class FileSplitterByPartSize

java.lang.Object
actors.Action
actors.FileSplitterByPartSize
All Implemented Interfaces:
FileSplitter
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileSplitterWithEncryption
public class FileSplitterByPartSize
extends Action
implements FileSplitter
A FileSplitter that splits Files by part size
